text: Rade Mihaljčić (; 21 January 1937 – 26 March 2020) was a Serbian historian and academic. His works deal with medieval Serbia, especially the Serbian empire and the Battle of Kosovo.Encyclopedia of Serbian Historiography, Sima Ćirković and Rade Mihaljčić (eds.), Belgrade, 1997. ==References== ==Other websites== * Biography on the website of ANURS Category:1937 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Serbian academics Category:Yugoslavian historians
title: Rade Mihaljčić
